name: places/ChIJC6dyvKlZwokRD3jXKxJGwz4
formattedAddress: 161 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 161 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10016-5421, USA

originalText.text:
Dr. Chen's medical practice is extremely business oriented. He has premade herbal medicine in stock and sell them at an unreasonably high price to his patients. Traditional Chinese medicine is supposed to craft a recipe for each patient according to their symptoms.

Apparently Dr. Chen has earned much profit from the general willingness to pay a high amount for treatment in Americans and deviated from the right mind of a medical practitioner.

There are relatively few options for Chinese traditional medical practice in Manhattan but it doesn't mean you should settle with this.

originalText.text: Best doctor! He relieved neck pain in one session! 100% recommended

text.text: Best doctor! He relieved neck pain in one session! 100% recommended

originalText.text: Dr. Chen is extremely business-oriented in his medical practice. He will use the methods that will take the longest to improve your symptoms to make you visit again and again. In my last visit, he was dismissive of my distress over my problems and his demeanor felt particularly mean-spirited. I hadn't been to his office for two years because I had no problems but he attributed my last visit's reason to not having visited for two years.

originalText.text: I went to Dr. Chen for over 5 years and I took the herbs and do not suffer from allergies anymore.  I highly recommend Dr. Chen as he understands the body and organs very well, and is highly knowledgeable in acupuncture and herbs

originalText.text: Everyone in Dr. Chen's office is kind. He helped me get through a tough physical issue. He cares about his patients and takes the time to listen and address your concerns!
